emailtemplate.description:
Template used when a property is Sold Using the Leave As Is (Ghost Listings 411) form
This includes the original property, sold property, and relocated property (if necessary).
Those actions will come from three separated templates and their tokens %% on this template will be replaced by code.
emailtemplate.name: Ghost Listing Sold Notification
emailtemplate.subject: Ghost Listing sold ${customrecord.custrecord_simple_name}
